content: The Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist fight can be difficult since there are two foes to contend with. Thankfully, they usually take turns fighting you, so you won't be tackling both of them at once for the entire fight. As you're fighting one, the other will eventually pop up, leaving the first to disappear for a while so you can focus on the second. There will be times, however, when they will both be present, so keep your eyes peeled.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Misty_Cloud,_Cloudy_Mist_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist Fight'.
The content is as follows:
The Misty Cloud, Cloudy Mist fight can be difficult since there are two foes to contend with. Thankfully, they usually take turns fighting you, so you won't be tackling both of them at once for the entire fight. As you're fighting one, the other will eventually pop up, leaving the first to disappear for a while so you can focus on the second. There will be times, however, when they will both be present, so keep your eyes peeled.
